document_data.name: Dragonbloods
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragonbloods''' were a criminal syndicate in [[Luskan]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] whose members were predominately [[Shou]].{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3412}}
document_data.Activities:
The Dragonbloods built a gangster empire centered around black market trade in unsavory goods, including [[drug]]s and [[slave]]s.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane||3}}

The gang's headquarters was the [[Dragon's Lair]], a reconstructed watch barracks on [[Blood Island]]. No strangers were allowed to approach without at least first relinquishing their weapons.
document_data.Membership: Their leader, [[Umbra]], was rumored to be a [[dragon]]{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|742}} although in reality he was some sort of [[doppelganger]].{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3427}} Each member of the gang had a dragon tattoo with older members having elaborate tattoos that covered most of their torsos.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3364}}
